Package manageCatalog

Class ProductVBoxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • manageCatalog.ProductVBoxController
  • public class ProductVBoxController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller helps to init the products/items in the manageCatalog Screen. It displays the current price, the title of the product or the item and the image.

      (package private) void openProductEditor​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method will open product/item in Product editor screen as a popup if the employee wants to edit the product/item in the manageCatalog Screen.
